caption.title: Performance of parameter estimation in the presence of within-host diversity.
caption.p: Here r denotes the rate of within-host population size increases (per day). Four levels of within-host diversity have been calculated: r = 1(blue), 0.5(orange), 0.3(green), 0.15(red), and r = 0 (purple) corresponding to no heterogeneity. Results are the mean of 100 simulations. Also the estimates (purple) and the corresponding 95% confidence intervals (shaded area) under the condition without within-host diversity are also calculate for comparison.
